amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for Immigration and Customs Enforcement by $2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. King (IA).
